dcterms:creator: Edward G Coffman, Jr
Michael R Garey
David S Johnson
Robert Endre Tarjan
dcterms:description: A classical and important optimization problem in logistic and production systems, focusing on packing cuboid-shaped items into bins to minimize the number of bins used.
dcterms:title: 3D Bin Packing Problem (BPP)

dcterms:creator: Oriol Vinyals
Meire Fortunato
Navdeep Jaitly
dcterms:description: A framework that utilizes deep reinforcement learning techniques to optimize combinatorial problems, including the 3D Bin Packing Problem.
dcterms:title: 3D BPP (general reference to various algorithms and methods)

dcterms:creator: Irwan Bello
Hieu Pham
Quoc V Le
Mohammad Norouzi
Samy Bengio
dcterms:description: A neural combinatorial optimization framework that applies reinforcement learning to solve various combinatorial problems, including the 3D Bin Packing Problem.
dcterms:title: 3D BPP (specific reference to the work of Bello et al.)

dcterms:creator: CS Chen
Shen-Ming Lee
QS Shen
dcterms:description: An analytical model addressing the container loading problem, which is a generalization of the 3D Bin Packing Problem where bins may have different sizes.
dcterms:title: Container Loading Problem

dcterms:creator: Michel Gendreau
Gilbert Laporte
Frédéric Semet
dcterms:description: Heuristics and lower bounds for the bin packing problem with conflicts, which adds complexity to the traditional bin packing problem.
dcterms:title: Bin Packing Problem with Conflicts

dcterms:creator: Silvano Martello
Michele Monaci
Daniele Vigo
dcterms:description: An exact approach to the strip-packing problem, which is closely related to the 3D Bin Packing Problem.
dcterms:title: 3D Strip Packing Problem
